response.overview: After denying a woman the extension she needs to keep her home, loan officer Christine Brown sees her once-promising life take a startling turn for the worse. Christine is convinced she's been cursed by a Gypsy, but her boyfriend is skeptical. Her only hope seems to lie in a psychic who claims he can help her lift the curse and keep her soul from being dragged straight to hell.
response.tagline: Christine Brown has a good job, a great boyfriend, and a bright future. But in three days, she's going to hell.
response.title: Drag Me to Hell

titles.title: Drag Me to Hell - Fahr mich zur Hölle

cast.name: Alex Veadov
